alert.note: Alert for Mercer (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 13 at 10:21AM CDT until further notice by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for Spring Creek at Zap affecting Mercer County in North Dakota. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Spring Creek at Zap. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 14.0 feet, Right bank overflows-west end of Zap begins to flood. Crop land and county roads flood along creek as well. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:45 AM CDT Thursday the stage was 14.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 14.4 feet this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage this evening. - Flood stage is 14.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 14.9 feet on 09/10/2010. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
